questions.question: What is the Mishnah in the context of Judaism?
options: A collection of songs and prayers used in the Jewish Temple.
The Oral Torah compiled and written down around 200 AD.
A historical account of the Jewish exile written by the prophets.
An ancient Jewish calendar used to track feasts and holy days.
answer: The Oral Torah compiled and written down around 200 AD

questions.question: Which of the following statements about the Septuagint are true?
options: It is a Greek translation of the Hebrew Scriptures.
It was created by early Christians to spread the gospel.
It includes books not found in the Hebrew Bible (Masoretic Text).
It was translated in Alexandria, Egypt.
answer: It is a Greek translation of the Hebrew Scriptures.
It includes books not found in the Hebrew Bible (Masoretic Text).
It was translated in Alexandria, Egypt.
